setPassword.infoDialog: This password will be used to encrypt your keys. If you lose your password then the only way to recover your account is to re-import your private keys.
setPassword.tooltip: Please enter a valid password to continue

saveKeys.confirmMsg: I have backed up my private key. I understand that my account can't be recovered without my private key.
saveKeys.tooltip: Please confirm you have backed up your private key first
saveKeys.userConfirm: I have backed up my private key. I understand that my account can't be recovered without my private key.

setupPlot.infoDialog: Subspace needs a place to store data files (Plots).
setupPlot.tooltip: You must allocate at least 1 GB of plot data to continue.

plottingProgress.infoDialog: This is a one-time process to prepare this device as a Subspace farmer.
plottingProgress.hintInfo: Join the Subspace Discord while you wait, meet the community and earn some SSC

importKey.tooltip: Please provide a valid key first.
